attributes.action: tax companies for packaging disposal, not the public....
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If you have to buy something and then get charged for rubbish collection then how do you control something you have no say in? 

Tax the companies for poor packaging and not the end user, does this not make more appropriate use of time and effort? where is the logic in taxing us twice for something we have no say in....

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
